author: pgoldstein
msg: Adding the hello name for the SMTP server to the mailet context.
Modified RemoteDelivery.java to load the hello name into the Javamail
Note: It might be desirable to refactor this submission so the
hello name is set once by the SMTPServer, rather than on each
initialize() of the SMTPHandler.  Changes coming to the SMTP code
should make this easier.  To be addressed shortly.
Thanks to Noel Bergman for the submission

author: pgoldstein
msg: Added comments.  Some rearranging of methods to match the Avalon lifecycle

author: pgoldstein
msg: Changing the listserver behavior to allow administrator specification of whether the subject prefix is bracketed.
Also added code to elegantly handle a syntactically invalid member email address on the list

author: pgoldstein
msg: Fixed bug in Java invocation for Phoenix on Windows.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Changes to support autodetecting of IP addresses.
Altered handling of default postmaster address.
Rearranged lifecycle methods to match lifecycle order.
